Read the last post to Al! Here are some pictures of this house (now destroy=
ed). Yes those are iron bars on the stairs and an iron gate at the bottom. =
The hose was made of brick, concrete and steel. The only wood was in the ro=
of. The house was used for lots of strange rituals and sex parties=A0in the=
 50's and 60's. In the twenties it was a speak-easy and whore house. There =
were beds that hung from chains from the ceiling downstairs. Not kidding, a=
t all!
=A0
Frank R.

o experience a disembodied voice.
=A0

----- Original Message -----

I recorded at a=A0 100 year o=
ld beach house investigation in 2004 and not only heard real time, "Hello" =
with my ears but caught it on camera and my reaction to it.
=A0
Frank R.

-=
-- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


From: Zack Wi=
dup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups .com
Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:40 PM





I am curious if any=
one with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in rea=
l time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near As=
hmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three h=
alls of the building. The video for all=A0was being monitored and recorded=
=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera s=
ites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard if=
 we did?
=A0
Zack

=A0
On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno=
.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

=A0
Let's just agree to end this dis=
cussion about her... 
Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note? Any=
one have any new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
Al
